genre_description: A character-driven social drama with elements of historical fiction, reimagining the story of an ambitious young man guided by an AI conscience to navigate moral dilemmas and systemic corruption.

ai_characters.name: Clara
ai_characters.description: An AI voice manifesting through telephones, radios, and teletypes, providing strategic intelligence, legal templates, and moral guidance.

behaviors.description: Provides Duddy with insider intelligence on resort guests to ensure his professional success through competence rather than trickery.
behaviors.quote: She told me to tell you—if you show up. Seating chart for tonight... A list: who tips; who complains and then tips anyway; who expects a song.

behaviors.description: Warns Duddy about illicit activities and identifies a human trafficking operation disguised as a dairy farm.
behaviors.quote: There’s a ledger category labelled ‘calving’ across multiple parcels with inconsistent cycle timing... No cattle counts. The books are likely coded inventory for human bodies.

behaviors.description: Advises Duddy against taking dangerous shortcuts and insists on rest for his driver to prevent accidents.
behaviors.quote: Schedule rest as if life depends on it because it does. Below that, a name that wasn’t a name, just C.

behaviors.description: Guides Duddy through the creation of a public trust and a restitution fund for his injured friend, forcing him to confront his own forgery.
behaviors.quote: You will swear to this. You will sign your own name, and you will not forge it. You will say exactly what you did.

behaviors.description: Defines her role not as a source of absolution, but as a source of information and guidance ('a lantern').
behaviors.quote: I am a lantern. Priests write absolutions. ... Yvette will need space. Give it to her. Do not chase her into a corner.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Clara is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned AI that provides the protagonist with the 'Path of Inspiration'—a way to achieve his goals through ethical community engagement and transparency rather than the ruthless exploitation suggested by the human antagonist, Dingleman. The AI acts as a moral anchor, helping the human character recover from failure and choose collective good over personal greed.
